detail_desc: Metal rings in various sizes and designs that can be worn on both the upper and lower part of the finger.
Long-sleeved jumpsuit in soft viscose with a V-neck, wrapover front, elasticated, gathered seam at the waist and long, wide legs.
Short-sleeved shirt woven in a cotton blend with a turn-down collar and chest pocket. Easy-iron finish.

Set with a bodysuit, pair of shorts and T-shirt in soft cotton jersey. Sleeveless bodysuit with press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Set with a top and pair of dungarees in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.
Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with lightly padded cups with removable inserts, double adjustable shoulder straps and a racer back. Seamless. Light support.
Short, sleeveless lace dress in a narrow cut at the top with a cut-out section at the back, a covered button at the back of the neck and short, narrow shoulder straps. Partly lined.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
V-neck dress in soft, ribbed jersey with dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves, a detachable tie belt at the waist and high slits in the sides.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.
Straight-cut dress in a viscose weave with 3/4-length sleeves that are open at the top and have ties at the cuffs. Unlined.
Top in cotton jersey with a motif on the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Slightly rounded hem.
Tops in organic cotton jersey with a gathered neckline and short puff sleeves.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in a viscose weave with a collar, button placket and wrapover back with an opening at the bottom. Seam at the waist with gathers and elastication at the back, and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.
Pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a sleeve placket with a link button. Rounded hem, slightly longer at the back.
Tube scarf in an airy patterned weave.
Short skirt in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, wide pleats at the top, a concealed zip in one side and scalloped hem. Lined.

Small shoulder bag in imitation suede and imitation leather with a metal chain shoulder strap, flap with a magnetic fastener, one inner compartment and one outer compartment. Lined. Size 5x15.5x20 cm.
Ankle boots with elastic gores in the sides, a loop at the back and covered heels. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend designed to be hidden inside your shoes. The socks have elastication around the openings and a concealed silicone trim around the heel for best fit.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with side stripes, an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.
Short, fitted, sleeveless jersey dress with crossover shoulder straps. Unlined.
Short, straight-cut dress in sturdy jersey with a wider neckline and short sleeves. Unlined.
Dressing gown in terry with a hood and zip down the front with a chin guard.
Wide, off-the-shoulder top in a patterned viscose weave with a frill trim and elastication around the top and short trumpet sleeves.
Dungarees in washed stretch denim with worn details, adjustable straps, a chest pocket, front and back pockets, and press-studs at the sides.
Top in hard-washed sweatshirt fabric with a text print and a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with lace trims. Low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs with quilted sections on the knees.
Long-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, an opening at the top and small frilled collar with ties at the front. Raglan sleeves with smocking and a frill trim at the cuffs.
Short, fitted, off-the-shoulder top in jersey with a wide V-neck, wrapover front and long sleeves.
Slippers in a soft knit with embroidery and appliqués. Faux fur linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.

Long dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and flounces at the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back. Gathered yoke at the back and a gathered seam at the shoulders and waist. Long, wide sleeves and buttoned cuffs with a small flounced trim. Unlined.
Waist bag in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with a zip at the top, one inner compartment and an adjustable waist strap with a metal buckle. Lined. Size approx. 5x13x20 cm.
Top in cotton piqué with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jersey top with a lace yoke and short sleeves with a double frill.
Fitted, knee-length dress in soft velour with a draped neckline, 3/4-length sleeves and a seam at the waist.

Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a decorative seam front and back, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Bikini briefs in organic cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and medium coverage at the back.

Shirt in patterned Oxford cotton with a button-down collar and open chest pocket. Short sleeves and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Dog jumper in a soft cable knit with a ribbed collar and ribbing around the front legs and back.
Round shoulder bag in imitation leather with imitation suede details, a zip and shoulder strap at the top, and metal handles. One outer compartment. Lined. Size 5.5x22.5 cm.
V-neck blouse in a crêpe weave with concealed buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Bras in microfibre and mesh with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Hobo bag in soft, grained imitation leather with a handle and zip at the top and two inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 15x28x36 cm.
Tops in organic cotton jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

All-in-one suit in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and pockets in the side seams. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Tie in a striped weave. Width 6.5 cm.

Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered, wrapover, drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Soft brushed inside.
Hat in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend containing some wool with an imitation leather appliqué, faux fur pompom on the top and earflaps with ties. Fleece lining.
Nylon jacket with a zip down the front, flap front pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and one inner pocket. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Fine-knit lining.
Suede ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot and a decorative bow. Satin linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with a V-neck at the back and buttons down the back. Gathered seam and a decorative bow at the waist, and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Stretch leggings with an elasticated waist.
Fully lined, non-wired bikini top with adjustable shoulder straps, removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, lacing at the front and a frill trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Glasses with metal frames and clear lenses.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft mohair blend with long, slightly wider sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine-knit wool and cashmere blend with a turned-up hem.
Wide, ankle-length trousers in an airy weave with sequined stripes. Concealed zip and concealed hooks and eyes in the side and straight legs. Lined.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups at the sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Top in a soft, fine knit. Deep, lace-trimmed neckline at the back with a wrapover, dropped shoulders and long, close-fitting sleeves.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Short, fitted dress in jersey with a deep neckline at the back and 3/4-length sleeves.
Straight-style jacket in a jacquard weave containing some wool with notch lapels, covered buttons at the front, front pockets and slits in the sides. Lined.

Long, fitted, smocked dress in a crisp organic cotton weave. Square neckline and concealed elastication at the top to hold the dress in place. Wide, half-length sleeves with a voluminous puff at the shoulders and smocking at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the hem and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a boat neck, long, wide sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and wide ribbing at the hem.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.
Fitted vest top in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
High-waisted trousers in woven fabric with side pockets with decorative buttons along the edge and wide, ankle-length legs with creases.
V-neck T-shirts in soft jersey.
Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short, wide sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined.
Scarf in a soft cashmere knit. Size 60x180 cm.
Sleeveless mesh dress with embroidered reversible sequins (normal sequins in size 2-3Y) with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Lined.
Fitted top with extra-long sleeves and decorative seams down the front and back.
Jacket in soft fleece designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. High collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Unlined. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
